title: Beyond Robinhood: 4 Financial Apps That Help Individual Investors Get Started in 2022
sub_head: A look at what these apps do—and don’t—offer, and how much they cost
body:
While Robinhood Markets Inc.’s trading app gets all the attention, most financial professionals agree that short-term trading isn’t the way to build long-term wealth.
The app was all the rage last year—with its stated goal of democratizing investing, while at the same time coming under fire for fueling an online-trading frenzy that left many short-term investors burned.
